title: Matt Johnson, author and ex-Preacher Gone To Texas
itunes:title: Matt Johnson, author and ex-Preacher Gone To Texas
description:
Have you ever wanted to know what it’s like inside the Pentagon? Or what it’s like to write a book? Let me good friend Matt Johnson tell you. He was the vocalist for hardcore bands Preacher Gone To Texas and Ignite the Will and one of the smartest people I know. He knows how to tell a story and that’s exactly why he’s on the show this week. We discuss all of those points and life in the midwest. Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
